achievements.name: TIMBER
achievements.description: Chop down your first tree.

achievements.name: NO_HOBO
achievements.description: Build a house suitable enough for your first town NPC, such as the guide, to move into.

achievements.name: OBTAIN_HAMMER
achievements.description: Obtain your first hammer via crafting or otherwise.

achievements.name: OOO_SHINY
achievements.description: Mine your first nugget of ore with a pickaxe.

achievements.name: HEART_BREAKER
achievements.description: Discover and smash your first heart crystal underground.

achievements.name: HEAVY_METAL
achievements.description: Obtain an anvil made from iron or lead.

achievements.name: I_AM_LOOT
achievements.description: Discover a golden chest underground and take a peek at its contents.

achievements.name: STAR_POWER
achievements.description: Craft a mana crystal out of fallen stars, and consume it.

achievements.name: HOLD_ON_TIGHT
achievements.description: Equip your first grappling hook.

achievements.name: EYE_ON_YOU
achievements.description: Defeat the Eye of Cthulhu, an ocular menace who only appears at night.

achievements.name: SMASHING_POPPET
achievements.description: Using explosives or your trusty hammer, smash a Shadow Orb or Crimson Heart in the evil parts of your world.

achievements.name: WORM_FODDER
achievements.description: Defeat the Eater of Worlds, a massive worm whom dwells in the corruption.

achievements.name: MASTERMIND
achievements.description: Defeat the Brain of Cthulhu, an enourmous demon brain which haunts the creeping crimson.

achievements.name: WHERES_MY_HONEY
achievements.description: Discover a large bee's hive deep in the jungle.

achievements.name: STING_OPERATION
achievements.description: Defeat the Queen Bee, the matriarch of the jungle hives.

achievements.name: BONED
achievements.description: Defeat Skeletron, the cursed guardian of the dungeon.

achievements.name: DUNGEON_HEIST
achievements.description: Steal a key from the dungeon's undead denizens, and unlock one of their precious golden chests.

achievements.name: ITS_GETTING_HOT_IN_HERE
achievements.description: Spelunk deep enough to reach the molten underworld.

achievements.name: MINER_FOR_FIRE
achievements.description: Craft a molten pickaxe using the hottest of materials.

achievements.name: STILL_HUNGRY
achievements.description: Defeat the Wall of Flesh, the master and core of the world who arises after a great, burning sacrifice.

achievements.name: ITS_HARD
achievements.description: Unleash the ancient spirits of light and darkness across your world, enabling much stronger foes and showering the world with dazzling treasures (and rainbows!).

achievements.name: BEGONE_EVIL
achievements.description: Smash a demon or crimson altar with a powerful, holy hammer.

achievements.name: EXTRA_SHINY
achievements.description: Mine a powerful ore that has been newly blessed upon your world.

achievements.name: HEAD_IN_THE_CLOUDS
achievements.description: Equip a pair of wings.

achievements.name: LIKE_A_BOSS
achievements.description: Obtain a boss-summoning item.

achievements.name: BUCKETS_OF_BOLTS
achievements.description: Defeat the three nocturnal mechanical menaces: the Twins, the Destroyer, and Skeletron Prime.

achievements.name: DRAX_ATTAX
achievements.description: Craft a drax or pickaxe axe using hallowed bars, and the souls of the three mechanical bosses.

achievements.name: PHOTOSYNTHESIS
achievements.description: Mine chlorophyte, an organic ore found deep among the thickest of flora.

achievements.name: GET_A_LIFE
achievements.description: Consume a life fruit, which grows in the thick of subterranean jungle grass.

achievements.name: THE_GREAT_SOUTHERN_PLANTKILL
achievements.description: Defeat Plantera, the overgrown monstrosity of the jungle's depths.

achievements.name: TEMPLE_RAIDER
achievements.description: Breach the impenetrable walls of the jungle temple.

achievements.name: LIHZAHRDIAN_IDOL
achievements.description: Defeat Golem, the stone-faced ritualistic idol of the lihzahrd tribe.

achievements.name: ROBBING_THE_GRAVE
achievements.description: Obtain a rare treasure from a difficult monster in the dungeon.

achievements.name: BIG_BOOTY
achievements.description: Unlock one of the dungeon's large, mysterious chests with a special key.

achievements.name: FISH_OUT_OF_WATER
achievements.description: Defeat Duke Fishron, mutant terror of the sea.

achievements.name: OBSESSIVE_DEVOTION
achievements.description: Defeat the Ancient Cultist, fanatical leader of the dungeon coven.

achievements.name: STAR_DESTROYER
achievements.description: Defeat the four celestial towers of the moon.

achievements.name: CHAMPION_OF_TERRARIA
achievements.description: Defeat the Moon Lord.

achievements.name: BLOODBATH
achievements.description: Survive a blood moon, a nocturnal event where the rivers run red and monsters swarm aplenty.

achievements.name: SLIPPERY_SHINOBI
achievements.description: Defeat King Slime, the lord of all things slimy.

achievements.name: GOBLIN_PUNTER
achievements.description: Triumph over a goblin invasion, a ragtag regiment of crude, barbaric, pointy-eared warriors and their shadowflame sorcerers.

achievements.name: WALK_THE_PLANK
achievements.description: Triumph over a pirate invasion, a group of pillagers from the sea out for your booty... and your life!

achievements.name: KILL_THE_SUN
achievements.description: Survive a solar eclipse, a day darker than night filled with creatures of horror.

achievements.name: DO_YOU_WANT_TO_SLAY_A_SNOWMAN
achievements.displayName: Do You Want to Slay a Snowman?
achievements.description: Triumph over the frost legion, a festive family of maniacal snowman mobsters.

achievements.name: TIN_FOIL_HATTER
achievements.description: Triumph over a martian invasion, when beings from out of this world come to scramble your brains and probe you in uncomfortable places.

achievements.name: BALEFUL_HARVEST
achievements.description: Reach the 15th wave of a pumpkin moon, where evil lurks among the autumn harvest.

achievements.name: ICE_SCREAM
achievements.description: Reach the 15th wave of a frost moon, where the festive season quickly degrades into madness.

achievements.name: STICKY_SITUATION
achievements.description: Survive the slime rain, where gelatinous organisms fall from the sky in droves.

achievements.name: REAL_ESTATE_AGENT
achievements.description: Have all possible town NPCs living in your world.

achievements.name: NOT_THE_BEES
achievements.description: Fire a Bee Gun while wearing a full set of Bee Armor.

achievements.name: JEEPERS_CREEPERS
achievements.description: Stumble into a spider cavern in the underground.

achievements.name: FUNKYTOWN
achievements.description: Build or encounter a glowing mushroom field above the surface.

achievements.name: INTO_ORBIT
achievements.description: You can only go down from here!

achievements.name: ROCK_BOTTOM
achievements.description: The only way is up!

achievements.name: MECHA_MAYHEM
achievements.description: Do battle against the Twins, the Destroyer, and Skeletron Prime simultaneously and emerge victorious.

achievements.name: GELATIN_WORLD_TOUR
achievements.description: Defeat every type of slime there is!

achievements.name: FASHION_STATEMENT
achievements.description: Equip armor or vanity clothing in all three social slots.

achievements.name: VEHICULAR_MANSLAUGHTER
achievements.description: Defeat an enemy by running it over with a minecart.

achievements.name: BULLDOZER
achievements.description: Destroy a total of 10,000 tiles.

achievements.name: THERE_ARE_SOME_WHO_CALL_HIM
achievements.displayName: There are Some Who Call Him...
achievements.description: Kill Tim.

achievements.name: DECEIVER_OF_FOOLS
achievements.description: Kill a nymph.

achievements.name: SWORD_OF_THE_HERO
achievements.description: Obtain a Terra Blade, forged from the finest blades of light and darkness.

achievements.name: LUCKY_BREAK
achievements.description: Survive a long fall with just a sliver of health remaining.

achievements.name: THROWING_LINES
achievements.description: Throw a yoyo.

achievements.name: DYE_HARD
achievements.description: Equip a dye in every possible dye slot.

achievements.name: SICK_THROW
achievements.description: Obtain the Terrarian.

achievements.name: FREQUENT_FLYER
achievements.description: Spend over 1 gold being treated by the nurse.

achievements.name: THE_CAVALRY
achievements.description: Equip a mount.

achievements.name: COMPLETELY_AWESOME
achievements.description: Obtain a minishark.

achievements.name: TIL_DEATH
achievements.description: Kill the groom.

achievements.name: ARCHAEOLOGIST
achievements.description: Kill Doctor Bones.

achievements.name: PRETTY_IN_PINK
achievements.description: Kill pinky.

achievements.name: RAINBOWS_AND_UNICORNS
achievements.description: Fire a rainbow gun while riding on a unicorn.

achievements.name: YOU_AND_WHAT_ARMY
achievements.description: Command nine summoned minions simultaneously.

achievements.name: PRISMANCER
achievements.description: Obtain a rainbow rod.

achievements.name: IT_CAN_TALK
achievements.description: Build a house in a mushroom biome and have the Truffle move in.

achievements.name: WATCH_YOUR_STEP
achievements.description: Become a victim to a nasty underground trap.

achievements.name: MARATHON_MEDALIST
achievements.description: Travel a total of 26.2 miles on foot.

achievements.name: GLORIOUS_GOLDEN_POLE
achievements.description: Obtain a golden fishing rod.

achievements.name: SERVANT_IN_TRAINING
achievements.description: Complete your 1st quest for the angler.

achievements.name: GOOD_LITTLE_SLAVE
achievements.description: Complete your 10th quest for the angler.

achievements.name: TROUT_MONKEY
achievements.description: Complete your 25th quest for the angler.

achievements.name: FAST_AND_FISHIOUS
achievements.description: Complete your 50th quest for the angler.

achievements.name: SUPREME_HELPER_MINION
achievements.description: Complete a grand total of 200 quests for the angler.

achievements.name: TOPPED_OFF
achievements.description: Attain maximum health and mana possible without accessories or buffs.

achievements.name: SLAYER_OF_WORLDS
achievements.description: Defeat every boss in Terraria.

achievements.name: YOU_CAN_DO_IT
achievements.description: Survive your character's first full night.

achievements.name: MATCHING_ATTIRE
achievements.description: Equip armor in all three armor slots: head, chest, and feet.

achievements.name: BENCHED
achievements.description: Craft your first work bench.

achievements.name: DEFEAT_EMPRESS_OF_LIGHT
achievements.description: Defeat the Empress of Light, responsible for all those flashy lights and glitter.

achievements.name: DEFEAT_QUEEN_SLIME
achievements.description: Defeat Queen Slime, giving the coup-de-grace to the sovereign of all that jiggles.

achievements.name: DEFEAT_DREADNAUTILUS
achievements.description: Defeat the Dreadnautilus, murderous mollusk lurking beneath the surface of the sanguine seas.

achievements.name: DEFEAT_OLD_ONES_ARMY_TIER3
achievements.description: Repel the strongest forces the Old One's Army can muster.

achievements.name: GET_ZENITH
achievements.description: Obtain the Zenith, the culmination of a journey forged into the ultimate sword.

achievements.name: GET_TERRASPARK_BOOTS
achievements.description: Obtain the Terraspark Boots, forged from the finest boots of fire and ice.

achievements.name: FLY_A_KITE_ON_A_WINDY_DAY
achievements.description: Fly a kite on a windy day.

achievements.name: FOUND_GRAVEYARD
achievements.description: Enter a misty graveyard filled with the surly dead.

achievements.name: GO_LAVA_FISHING
achievements.description: Drop a lure in a pool of lava for a pre-fried haul!

achievements.name: TURN_GNOME_TO_STATUE
achievements.description: Trick a gnome into turning into stone!

achievements.name: TALK_TO_NPC_AT_MAX_HAPPINESS
achievements.description: Meet with a tenant who's as happy as they possibly can be!

achievements.name: PET_THE_PET
achievements.description: Deliver headpats to the town pet.

achievements.name: FIND_A_FAIRY
achievements.description: Encounter a fairy.

achievements.name: THROW_A_PARTY
achievements.description: What you're celebrating doesn't matter, just throw a party already!

achievements.name: DIE_TO_DEAD_MANS_CHEST
achievements.description: You were so preoccupied with whether or not you could open the chest that you didn't stop to think if you should.

achievements.name: DEFEAT_DEERCLOPS
achievements.description: Defeat Deerclops, the chilly one-eyed monstrosity from a foreign land.

achievements.name: GET_GOLDEN_DELIGHT
achievements.description: Obtain Golden Delight, the highest quality meal made from the highest quality . . . ingredients.

achievements.name: DRINK_BOTTLED_WATER_WHILE_DROWNING
achievements.description: Delay death from drowning by drinking water. It doesn't make much sense, but you did what you had to do.

achievements.name: GET_CELL_PHONE
achievements.description: Obtain the Cell Phone. You'll never leave home without it again.

achievements.name: GET_ANKH_SHIELD
achievements.description: Obtain the Ankh Shield, the finest protection from unpleasant maladies and ailments.

achievements.name: GAIN_TORCH_GODS_FAVOR
achievements.description: Invoked the wrath of the God of Torches, and survived long enough to earn its blessing.

achievements.name: PLAY_ON_A_SPECIAL_SEED
achievements.description: Some very special seeds can lead to unique and rewarding experiences. Can you find one?

achievements.name: ALL_TOWN_SLIMES
achievements.description: Find all of the Slime Pets and have them move in!

achievements.name: TRANSMUTE_ITEM
achievements.description: Shimmer an item into another item. What other transmutations can you find?

achievements.name: PURIFY_ENTIRE_WORLD
achievements.description: Completely purify all Corruption, Crimson, and Hallow from your world, until the Dryad is satisfied!

achievements.name: TO_INFINITY_AND_BEYOND
achievements.description: Fly a Kwad Racer into outer space.

achievements.name: BOOK_WORM
achievements.description: Catalogue every creature in the world.

achievements.name: BOULDER_LORD
achievements.description: Prove your worth against the Moon Lord's worst.

achievements.name: QUEEN_MACHINE
achievements.description: Defeated the combined form of the 3 mechanical giants.

achievements.name: ROLLIN_IN_YOUR_GRAVE
achievements.description: Take a ride in your final resting place.

achievements.name: FEAR_THE_SUN
achievements.description: Dawn the garb of a vampire and get a sunburn.

achievements.name: ITS_SHALING_OUTSIDE
achievements.description: Survive the dreaded rain of boulders.

achievements.name: EXTRA_LIFE
achievements.description: Die as a hardcore character and survive to tell the tale.

achievements.name: GRAVE_MISTAKE
achievements.description: Accidentally kill a friend with your tombstone.

achievements.name: SPICY_LICKS
achievements.description: Jam out on a six stringed instrument.

achievements.name: ORGANIZED_CHAOS
achievements.description: Find the ultra rare Rod of Discord.

achievements.name: ON_FLEEK
achievements.description: Spot the sun on a cool day.

achievements.name: FORTUNE_FAVORS_THE_BOULD
achievements.description: Discover a friendly boulder.

achievements.name: TRAINING_DAY
achievements.description: Get your villagers fully combat ready.

achievements.name: MINI_ME
achievements.description: Become a Moon Lord impersonator.

achievements.name: TERRARIST
achievements.description: Scare your villagers with a stink bug sword.

achievements.name: NEW_DIGS
achievements.description: Give any villager a new look.

achievements.name: MY_PEOPLE_NEED_ME
achievements.description: Embark on a one way trip into outer space.

achievements.name: GOING_OLDSCHOOL
achievements.description: Bring back the original title screen.

achievements.name: SEA_YOU_LATER
achievements.description: Craft the final upgrade to the Cell Phone.

achievements.name: TRASH_COMPACTOR
achievements.description: Research 50% of all items in Journey Mode.

achievements.name: CONSERVATIONIST
achievements.description: Support sustainable logging by planting 100 acorns.

achievements.name: INTERDIMENSIONAL_RECYCLING
achievements.description: Give the Dryad a can of Joja Cola.
